articles.description: US Cyber Command expanded its operations aimed at identifying malicious foreign cyber actors before Tuesday's presidential election, using missions to not only seek out Russian hackers, but those from Iran and China as well, a US official confirmed to CNN.

articles.author: Story by Reuters
articles.title: Gunmen kill 32, burn houses in attack in Ethiopia
articles.description: Gunmen have killed 32 people and torched more than 20 houses in a raid in western Ethiopia, a regional administrator said on Monday.

articles.author: Josh Campbell
articles.title: FBI firearm background checks set all-time record in 2020
articles.description: The FBI conducted more firearm background checks in 2020 than in any year since the agency began keeping statistics in 1998, according to new data released by the agency on Monday.

articles.title: A 13-year-old Missouri boy's last day of school was in late October. He died from Covid-19 days later
articles.description: An eighth grade student from Missouri passed away from complications related to Covid-19, officials in his school district said.

articles.title: This tiny township is one of the first to announce results on Election Day
